hero.tagline: An integrated platform for building powerful AI solutions without code
hero.title:
Complete your AI workflow
without complex coding.
hero.description:
Combine various LLMs and build, deploy chatbots all at once.
Anyone can create AI with HyperFlow AI's drag-and-drop interface.

intro.text: Work quickly and flexibly from no-code development to real-time testing and service launch
intro.title: HyperFlow automates every process of AI development

features.sectionTitle: Unique strengths of HyperFlow AI, the next-generation development platform

dragDrop.title: Drag and Drop Workflow
dragDrop.description: Design AI flows by connecting nodes with an intuitive interface. Complex logic can be implemented with just drag and drop, allowing you to quickly build high-quality AI applications without coding.

ragChatbot.title: Easy RAG Chatbot with Built-In
ragChatbot.description: Use HyperFlow's pre-built templates to build a complete knowledge-based AI chatbot with just document uploads and database connections.

multimodal.title: Multidimensional Multimodal Support
multimodal.description: Expand AI capabilities by processing various forms of data including text, images, audio, PDFs, and more.

deployment.title: Instant Deployment with One Click
deployment.description: Deploy AI services instantly with a single click. Without complex environment setup, everything from development to launch is connected in real-time.

noCode.title: Scalable No-Code Environment
noCode.description: Build quickly with no-code, and add custom code when needed. HyperFlow's hybrid environment provides complete control and flexibility.

security.title: Enterprise-Level Security
security.description: HyperFlow provides enterprise-level security. Register APT keys with admin privileges and set granular access permissions per project for enhanced security.

llm.title: Freely utilize various LLMs supported by HyperFlow AI to complete your own AI

circularFlow.title: 01 Circular Flow
circularFlow.description: Supports an automatic learning loop structure where AI learns from results and adjusts inputs. Automatically repeats the test-modify-improve process, implementing an evolutionary development environment with continuous optimization.

superNode.title: 02 Super Node
superNode.description: HyperFlow's super nodes are not tied to specific APIs or platforms, allowing you to reuse flows without recreating them when introducing new technologies or changing vendors. This provides a faster and more flexible development environment.

processData.title: 03 Process & Data Integration
processData.description: HyperFlow integrates multimodal data flows and process workflows within a single system. It also stores context at each stage through flow memory functionality, allowing reference to previous results or data states.

dualEngine.title: 04 Dual Execution Engine
dualEngine.description: HyperFlow runs identically in both IDE test environments and actual production environments. Developers can deploy experimental flows directly to production without a separate transition process, enabling AI workflow construction that breaks down the boundaries between development and deployment.

assetStore.title: 05 Integrated Asset Store
assetStore.description: HyperFlow has integrated all essential tools for development in one place. Reuse flows and nodes through Asset Store, and complete everything from design to deployment and automated management in one stop through Chatbot and DevOps.

superNodeSection.title: Automate complex AI tasks with integrated super nodes
superNodeSection.cardTitle: Super Node that connects multiple services into one
superNodeSection.cardDescription: HyperFlow's super node is a flexible abstraction engine that controls all services through a single interface.

workflow.title: Getting Started with HyperFlow AI
workflow.subtitle: Three steps are enough without complex coding. Your idea becomes a service.

dataConnection.title: Data Connection
dataConnection.description: Upload documents or connect to data to create a knowledge base for AI services.

workflowDesign.title: Workflow Design
workflowDesign.description: Design AI workflows with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

deployManage.title: Deploy & Manage
deployManage.description: Embed in various forms such as chatbots and API integrations, and deploy and manage with one click.

templates.title: Create everything you can imagine
templates.subtitle: Create AI applications tailored to various industries and purposes. Build customized workflows and tools that solve real problems.

documentSearch.title: Document Search & Summary
documentSearch.description: Build an AI system that quickly finds and summarizes necessary information from large volumes of documents.

customerService.title: Customer Service Chatbot
customerService.description: Build a chatbot that provides 24/7 customer support to increase customer satisfaction and reduce operating costs.

personalized.title: Personalized Recommendation System
personalized.description: Create your own AI that analyzes user preferences and behavior patterns to provide personalized recommendations.

contentGeneration.title: Content Generation Tool
contentGeneration.description: Develop an AI tool that automatically generates blog posts, marketing copy, and social media content.

lowContent.title: Lead innovation in the AI era with HyperFlow AI
lowContent.text: The AI era has already begun. HyperFlow will be the engine that accelerates that change and connects your imagination to business.

footer.tagline: An integrated platform for building powerful AI solutions without code

library.title: My library
library.description: Manage and deploy your chatbots built with agents and flow graphs

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description: HyperFlow manages and modifies the knowledge DB to provide optimized answers according to user needs and preferences, and supports RAG functionality.
knowledgeBase.uploadText: Please select a file to upload
